product_name: Timex Expedition Rugged Metal Field Watch - Men's
long_description: The Timex Expedition Rugged Metal field watch keeps you on track with accuracy and a durable, handsome build that looks great and stands up to your adventures in the backcountry or on Front Street. Sturdy stainless-steel case and scratch-resistant mineral glass endure heavy outdoor use. Date window inset at the 3 o'clock position features easy-to-set Quick-Date(R) function. INDIGLO(R) night light for easy viewing after the sun goes down. Leather strap is water-resistant and comfortable. The Timex Expedition Rugged Metal field watch is water resistant to 50m (165 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Expedition Rugged Metal field watch keeps you on track with accuracy and a durable, handsome build that looks great and stands up to your adventures in the backcountry or on Front Street.
